yesterday the Kyoto city court in Japan
sentenced  death penalty for the perpetrator of the
Kyoto Animation studio fire that
occurred in 2019, killing 36 people and
injuring 32.
At the trial, the perpetrator xi aoba
admitted to the act of arson. Y said the
motive for the crime was belief.  that Kyoto
Animation had plagiarized
its novel idea. Prosecutors
requested the death penalty while
B's lawyer requested a lighter sentence or
acquittal on the grounds that the perpetrator's capacity to act was impaired.
However, the Court dismissed the lawyer's argument
and sentenced aoba to death.
In 2019, shinji alva broke into the

2030, scientists in Berlin,
Germany, recently announced the first successful embryo transfer
in a white rhino.
brings hope to save the northern white rhinoceros
from the danger of
extinction. The white rhino consists of two
separate subspecies, the northern and southern subspecies. The
last northern white rhinoceros
died in 2018. Currently this species  There are only
two females left, both of which
cannot get pregnant because they are no longer healthy.
In September 2023, a team of
bior rescue scientists used
insemination in the experiment to retrieve eggs from
female rhinos.  Northern region and used the
naked semen of dead male rhinos
to create embryos and then transferred them to female
Southern rhinos for surrogacy.
On October 24, the Bio rescue group
confirmed that the surrogacy process had created
gave birth to a Thanh Thanh Con pregnancy lasting
70 days with a well-developed 6.4 cm long male replacement embryo. The
number of white rhinoceros species
has decreased sharply due to the increase in the number of thieves on
